description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Slow time to a crawl and weave your way through a sea of bullets as you blast your way through hundreds of levels! Redshift is a procedurally generated shooter, where each level's enemies and boss are uniquely generated every time you play. With more than 500 levels of ever-increasing difficulty, there's a challenge for everyone from beginners to bullet hell veterans.
